title: Kan zin kawng khawhar takah hian
lyrics:
Kan zin kawng khawhar takah hian
Harsatna tawk mah ila,
Lalpa nen chuan vanram a chang thin,
A mite min veng reng thin.

Lal Isua nen engkim a ropui,
Lungngaih tuifawn karah pawh;
Lallukhum chu kan chang ngei ang,
Lal Isua kan zui tlat chuan.

Kan thawhrimna kan zawh hunin,
Kan zin kawng kan pelh hunin,
Anin min lawm ang, a ramah chuan,
"Lo haw rawh, lo chawl tawh la,"
